td.content: shows enlargement of the hilar vasculature

td.content: s:patient indicates moderate back pain, moderate shortness of breath, moderate breathlessness and Heart. she is a F physician aged 54 Ys. denies any alcohol use she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life o:Height 61 in, Weight 117 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15, Chest = B/L basilar crepitations, Heart = S3 present, no murmurs, Extremities = no cyanosis, no edema or clubbing, Heart = distant S1 & S2 sounds, no murmurs, moderate respiratory distress a:Chronic Congestive Heart Failure p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed valsartan - 160 mg 2 x day, and ordered Chest X-Ray.

content2.Unmatched: denies any alcohol use she states she has

td.content: s:a 55 yr old female physician presents with moderate back pain, moderate shortness of breath and moderate breathlessness. she is having symptoms 5-6 times a week, in spite of treatment. o:Height 62 in, Weight 119 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16, Chest = B/L basilar crepitations, Heart = S3 present, no murmurs, Extremities = no cyanosis, no edema or clubbing, Heart = distant S1 & S2 sounds, no murmurs, moderate respiratory distress a:Chronic Congestive Heart Failure p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to cardiology.

s:patient presents with moderate shortness of breath, moderate back pain and moderate breathlessness for 6 weeks. she is a 55 yo f physician. o:Height 62 in, Weight 120 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17, Chest = B/L basilar crepitations, Heart = S3 present, no murmurs, Extremities = no cyanosis, no edema or clubbing, Heart = distant S1 & S2 sounds, no murmurs, moderate respiratory distress a:Chronic Congestive Heart Failure p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed valsartan - 160 mg 2 x day, and ordered Mitral valve replacement - heart.
Do not IV Fluid and Support
